import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Rotate secret"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/apps/{id}/rotate-secret"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to rotate the secret of a set of credentials in your Port organization.<br/>

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"id","description":"The `id` of the credentials set you want to rotate the secret for.<br/>","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Secret rotated successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ok":{"type":"any","enum":[true]},"app":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"id":{"type":"string"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"secret":{"type":"string"}}}},"required":["ok"],"additionalProperties":false,"description":"OK"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
